about_the_game:
"SHADOW DETECTIVE" is a first-person 3D horror adventure game for solo play
where you can enjoy exploration and scenarios to find the cause while protecting yourself
from supernatural activity at a high school during the night.

Move around the rooms freely without loading and enjoy a real-time horror adventure with zero cutscenes.
Players can explore escaping from the darkness of invisible enemies and sometimes beating them.
This game will present you to get a new experience of horror that it never was previously in single-player horror games.

Psychological play with an invisible enemy


Invisible enemies attack the player. Whenever enemies attack the player,
they will absorb your life energy and gradually reveal themselves.
The more your life energy is absorbed, the clearer the enemy's appearance becomes,
and the more difficult it is for the player to escape from the enemy.
To protect you from enemy’s attacks, you can use special gadgets,
such as a machine that detects the movement of invisible enemies,
a mobile battery that restores the battery of a flashlight, etc. The thrill and fun of escaping
from dangerous situations by using the right gadget at the right time await you.

A school where you never know what might happen


The objects placed on campus are not only just decoration.
Some make creaking noises, some malfunction, and some start moving around on their own.
And what is scariest of all is that the enemy himself is causing such paranormal activity.
In SHADOW DETECTIVE, supernatural activities that change each time you play are waiting for you.

Flashlight gadget that requires player’s planning


SHADOW DETECTIVE's flashlight consumes battery whenever it is used,
and when the battery reaches a certain level, the brightness of the flashlight becomes very low.
Therefore, players must use modified mobile batteries to charge their flashlight batteries.
Using outlets located throughout the school, players can recharge their mobile batteries
and replenish their flashlight batteries to continue their exploration.
You are able to continue to explore while charging the mobile battery or wait until the charge for a safe play.
Players can choose one of them depending on the player’s plan.

Streaming play


It would be appreciated that you include the Steam "SHADOW DETECTIVE" URL in the streaming overview, if possible.
There are no problems with your monetization either.
※ If it is difficult, it is recommended to introduce it within the streaming.

For detailed content guidelines, please refer to the LOOIFEND GAMES official website.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
